commenter_a: True Feminism exhibits equality. Real Feminists are not extremists seeking to belittle others. Liberal or conservative politics have nothing to do with that. Real Feminism exists on a daily basis through all walks of life. It's sad that people can be so ignorant to this definition and can only judge radicalism with radical judgement.
